subst

protected String subst(String value,
                       Connector[] connectors)
This function will replace expressions like ${connectors.string['']}.

Parameters:
value - The value or Expression.
connectors - required for validating Expression like ${connectors.string['']}
Returns:
the String-Value of the given value or Expression

subst

protected Object subst(String value,
                       Connector[] connectors,
                       Class clazz)
This function will replace expressions like ${connectors.object['']} or simply ${true}.

Parameters:
value - The value or Expression.
clazz - The expected Class.
connectors - required for validating Expression like ${connectors.string['']}
Returns:
the Object-Value of the given value or Expression.

addExpressionAttribute

public void addExpressionAttribute(String key,
                                   Object value)
Add a ExpressionAttribute like ('ContextPath', 'myApp').

A settings4j.xml Value like value="c:/settings/${contextPath}" will be evaluated as "c:/settings/myApp".

Parameters:
key - The Key as String.
value - The value as Object.
